message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would really benefit you and I'm willing to part with it for $13,500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $11,000 is a tempting offer, the value of this product is considerably higher. I'm willing to meet you halfway - how about $12,250?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,500, but that's as high as I can go.
